title: [Large-Scale] VR-Based Digital Literacy-Enhanced Mathematics Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical literacy and fundamental digital device operation skills
context.additional_context: Education on visualizing mathematical concepts through VR content creation and collaboration in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can recreate real-life problems in a 3D virtual space using mathematical modeling tools in a VR environment
Learners can improve VR-based math learning content through peer evaluation and feedback by applying digital media literacy
Learners can reinterpret math artifacts created with collaboration tools in virtual reality spaces according to diverse sociocultural contexts
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
